001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format;
002
003import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogFormatter;
004import io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.FormatterFactory.CompositeFactory;
005import io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.FormatterFactory.FormatterConfig;
006import io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.FormatterFactory.KeywordFactory;
007import io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.internal.Node;
008import io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.internal.Parser;
009import io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.internal.Node.CompositeNode;
010import io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.internal.Node.End;
011import io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.internal.Node.FormattingNode;
012import io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.internal.Node.KeywordNode;
013import io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.internal.Node.LiteralNode;
014
015/**
016 * Compiles a pattern into a formatter.
017 */
018public sealed interface PatternCompiler {
019
020        /**
021         * Compiles a pattern into a formatter.
022         * @param pattern logback style pattern.
023         * @return formatter.
024         */
025        public LogFormatter compile(String pattern);
026
027}
028
029final class Compiler implements PatternCompiler {
030
031        private final FormatterConfig config;
032
033        private final PatternRegistry registry;
034
035        Compiler(PatternRegistry registry, FormatterConfig config) {
036                this.config = config;
037                this.registry = registry;
038        }
039
040        @Override
041        public LogFormatter compile(String pattern) {
042                Parser p = new Parser(pattern);
043                return compile(p.parse());
044        }
045
046        LogFormatter compile(Node start) {
047                var b = LogFormatter.builder();
048                if (start == Node.end()) {
049                        return b.flatten();
050                }
051
052                for (Node n = start; n != Node.end();) {
053                        n = switch (n) {
054                                case End e -> {
055                                        yield e;
056                                }
057                                case LiteralNode ln -> {
058                                        b.text(ln.value());
059                                        yield ln.next();
060                                }
061                                case FormattingNode fn -> {
062                                        FormatterFactory f = registry.getOrNull(fn.keyword());
063                                        if (f == null) {
064                                                throw new IllegalStateException("Missing formatter for key: " + fn.keyword());
065                                        }
066
067                                        var _child = switch (fn) {
068                                                case CompositeNode cn -> cn.childNode();
069                                                case KeywordNode kn -> null;
070                                        };
071
072                                        var formatter = switch (f) {
073                                                case KeywordFactory kf -> kf.create(config, fn);
074                                                case CompositeFactory cf -> {
075                                                        LogFormatter child = _child == null ? null : compile(_child);
076                                                        yield cf.create(config, fn, child);
077                                                }
078                                        };
079                                        b.add(formatter);
080                                        yield fn.next();
081                                }
082                        };
083                }
084                return b.flatten();
085        }
086
087}
